content:
/>
III.i.2.D.1.e
.
Documenting Information Received by Telephone
Summarize the details of telephone contact with a claimant and/or authorized representative on
VA Form 27-0820, Report of General Information
.  Document unsuccessful attempts to contact a claimant and/or authorized representative by telephone as a permanent note
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Evidence Requested From the Claimant
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
